title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Software Design Patterns Using Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Blended learning course performing project-based assessments in smartphone-centric constrained tech environments. Emphasizes design pattern application for real-life problem-solving.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the concepts and application cases of eight core design patterns (e.g., Singleton, Factory, Observer).
Learners can analyze simple software problems, select appropriate design patterns, and represent them via UML diagrams.
Learners can complete team projects reflecting peer feedback and apply design patterns to real-world scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
